entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
